Online gradient descent regret bound

(OGD Regret Bound)

After TT steps, Ïµ=[âˆ‘i=1Tfi(ğ±(i))]âˆ’[âˆ‘i=1Tfi(ğ±*)]â‰¤RGT\epsilon = [\sum_{i=1}^T f_i(\mathbf{x}^{(i)})]-[\sum_{i=1}^T f_i(\mathbf{x}^{*})] \leq RG\sqrt{T}

average regret over time is bounded by ÏµTâ‰¤RGT\frac{\epsilon}{T} \leq \frac{RG}{\sqrt{T}}, goes â†’0\rightarrow 0 as Tâ†’âˆT \rightarrow \infty

Note: no assumptions on how f1,â€¦,fTf_1,â€¦,f_T relate to each other, allowing even for these to be chosen adversarially, e.g. with fif_i depending on our choice of ğ±i\mathbf{x}_i and all previous choices.
